TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageContextTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: 提供能將 轉換成可序列化為 XAML 之格式的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> 不能序列化為 XAML。 若要解決此問題，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter> 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> 類別的執行個體轉換為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension> 的執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public XPathMessageContextTypeConverter ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: XPathMessageContextTypeConverter();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。
